replacements.old: show an overview of specific functions
replacements.new: Displays an overview of specific Proxmox Backup Server (PBS) related functions in the script, showing their usage, shortname, and description

replacements.old: show an overview of specific variables
replacements.new: Displays an overview of PBS-specific variables defined in the configuration file, showing their names, values, and usage across different files

replacements.old: Download Proxmox GPG key and verify checksums.
replacements.new: Downloads the Proxmox GPG key for Debian Bookworm, saves it to the trusted.gpg.d directory, and verifies both SHA512 and MD5 checksums for security

replacements.old: Add Proxmox repository to sources.list if not already present.
replacements.new: Adds the Proxmox Backup Server repository to /etc/apt/sources.list if not already present, enabling access to PBS packages without a subscription

replacements.old: Update package lists and upgrade packages.
replacements.new: Updates package lists and upgrades all installed packages on the system, ensuring PBS and other software are up to date

replacements.old: Restore datastore configuration file with given parameters.
replacements.new: Restores or creates a Proxmox Backup Server datastore configuration file (/etc/proxmox-backup/datastore.cfg) with specified datastore name and path
